title: U.S. cities tackle crime with tech and friendly policing
text:
U.S. cities tackle crime with tech and friendly policing 1:36am IST - 02:10 
U.S. police forces are reporting a reduction in violence in major U.S. cities by combining the latest crime-fighting software with a friendlier street-level policing that is aimed at building trust with a skeptical public   
U.S. police forces are reporting a reduction in violence in major U.S. cities by combining the latest crime-fighting software with a friendlier street-level policing that is aimed at building trust with a skeptical public  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/06/us-cities-tackle-crime-with-tech-and-fri?videoId=379512534&videoChannel=101
